page.description: RadioButton controls are appropriate when you want to select between a small number of choices.

section.title: In-line style
section.description: Specifies style attributes that override the settings inherited from the style sheet. Click to define the In-line style. Refer to the Style Editor for details.

section.title: Orientation
section.description: The orientation of the label. The choices are: "Horizontal" and "Vertical"
